bibl.title: Photograph of a map of the Post Hospital, Columbia Barracks, Havana, Cuba, with annotations by [Philip Showalter Hench] and Albert E. Truby, 1899

div1.head: Photograph of a map of the Post Hospital, Columbia Barracks, Havana, Cuba, with annotations by [Philip Showalter Hench] and Albert E. Truby, 1899
div1.p:
C2
B3
Borrowed from Engineering Offices (Chief Engineer)
Ciudad Miliar, Havana April 3, 1941
This is left 1/3 of map. labelled (upper right corner
map of Camp Columbia, Cuba
showing
Barracks of 8th Infantry, 7th Calvary, & 2nd Artillery
Buildings for Post Hospital, Veterinary Hospital
Commissary & Quartermaster
Genl C. F. Humphery B. F. Dickson
Deputy Quartermaster. G'nel, U.S.A Supt. Barracks Construction
Chief Quartermaster, Div. of Cuba,
1899
In the lower right of the map it shows a house in
Buena Vista labelled “Gen Lee's old Head quarters”
Wavy lines are obviously elevations
Please return to
PS Hench
This shows our original lab and office, but does
not show the receiving ward. The nurses quarters were
smaller and nearer the officer's qrs. was the Venereal
ward. It is also interesting in showing the sewer lines. AET.
